column2: 18.5.1 Definition of Icing Conditions ▲: OAT ( on the ground and for takeoff ) or?
column3: OAT ( on the ground and for takeoff ) or TAT (inflight) is 10°C or below, and

column2: 18.5.1 Definition of Icing Conditions ▲: visible moisture in any form is present such as clouds,?
column3: visible moisture in any form is present such as clouds, fog with visibility of one mile or less, rain, snow, sleet and ice crystals, or

column2: 18.5.1 Definition of Icing Conditions ▲: when operating on ramps, taxiways, or runways where surface snow,?
column3: when operating on ramps, taxiways, or runways where surface snow, ice, standing water, or slush may be ingested by engines, freeze on engines, nacelles, or engine sensor probes.
